alert.note: Alert for DeWitt; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 7:45PM CDT until September 25 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... DeWitt County in south central Texas... Southwestern Lavaca County in south central Texas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 744 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Yoakum to Yorktown, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cuero, Yoakum, Yorktown, Thomaston, Hochheim, Westhoff, Edgar, Gruenau, Terryville, New Davy, Meyersville, Arneckville, and Concrete. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
